name: Crossing Man
description: Cross or you will die. You become a public enemy in the skyscrapers! Cross the buildings and run away from killers chasing you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 /  AMD FX™ 8350 equal or better Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 equal or better Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 / AMD FX™ 8370 equal or better Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeo RX 480 equal or better Storage: 2 GB available space
